text: Andro, the Greek prefix meaning male, man, or masculine, can refer to a number of things: *A slang word for anabolic steroids *androstenedione *An Dro, folk dance from Brittany. *Andro (album), a 2020 album by Tommy Lee People *Andro Hart, Scottish printer *Andro Linklater, Scottish non-fiction writer and historian *Andro Wekua, Georgian-born Swiss artist Town * Andro, Imphal East - a town in Manipur, India
title: Andro
